LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulCooking.label: masterful cooking
LanguageData.VQEA_MasterfulCooking.description: A multiplier on cooking speed, associated with the masterful cooking archite gene.
LanguageData.VQEA_Prowess.label: prowess
LanguageData.VQEA_Prowess.description: A multiplier on melee hit chance and dodge chance, associated with the prowess archite gene. Bear in mind base game doesn't show Melee hit chance on this infobox.
